comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: books.google.com/books?id=CRMbAQAAIAAJ&pg=PA170&l... indicates that Gaynor Park was dedicated on Dec 20, 1913 (which doesn't match the date deciphered by Wystan) with pageants and games under the direction of William J Lee. The NYT of the following day talks about the historical pageant. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=950DE0DD1F3BE633A...

comment._content: Thanks swanq, for locating the information.  We'll add the date to the records next time we update.
